ch0151_00_melissa/0101_0701_01_10:
Ah, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I was waiting for you so long!
ch0151_00_melissa/0101_0701_02_10:
I am so happy that I got to see you!
I will show you my happiness through dance!
ch0151_00_melissa/0601_0701_01_10:
I would like to see Pokémon contests become
popular on Pasio, too.
ch0151_00_melissa/0601_0701_02_10:
I am from Hearthome City, where we have
contests to show off our Pokémon’s charms.
ch0151_00_melissa/0601_0701_03_10:
The Pokémon and their Trainers get dressed up
so beautiful! I always wear my dress on the stage,
of course!
ch0151_00_melissa/0601_0701_04_10:
It would be magnifique if the sync pairs on Pasio
started a Pokémon contest—just spectaculaire!
ch0151_00_melissa/0601_0702_01_10: Trainers dress up with their Pokémon for contests!
ch0151_00_melissa/0601_0702_02_10:
If you are ever interested in competing,
you will let me decide your costume, yes?
ch0151_00_melissa/0602_0701_01_10: I love dancing and Pokémon about the same.
ch0151_00_melissa/0602_0701_02_10:
That is why I spend all my days dancing or in
Pokémon battles!
ch0151_00_melissa/0602_0701_03_10:
I love doing both. But what is even better than
doing each one separately...
ch0151_00_melissa/0602_0701_04_10:
is to dance with all of my Pokémon!
I can do that forever!
ch0151_00_melissa/0602_0702_01_10: Every day is filled with such joie for me!
ch0151_00_melissa/0602_0702_02_10:
Pourquoi?
Because I spend my days surrounded by things
I absolutely love!
ch0151_00_melissa/0603_0701_01_10:
I did not know much about Pokémon at first—
not a thing!
ch0151_00_melissa/0603_0701_02_10:
But I, how do you say, hit the books and practiced
much! Then, I became a Gym Leader!
ch0151_00_melissa/0603_0701_03_10:
Studying was très difficile, but I never thought
it was a burden.
ch0151_00_melissa/0603_0701_04_10:
Why? Because I love Pokémon!
I want to know everything about them!
ch0151_00_melissa/0603_0701_05_10:
I can study for hours if it is something I love!
No problème!
ch0151_00_melissa/0603_0702_01_10:
Learning something you love is not work at all!
C’est, how do you say, delightful!
ch0151_00_melissa/0603_0702_02_10:
If you have something you love, try learning more
about it! You will have so much fun!
ch0151_00_melissa/0604_0701_01_10:
Mismagius’s cries sound like incantations, and they
can cause pain for her targets.
ch0151_00_melissa/0604_0701_02_10:
But they do not bother me. In fact, her cries make
me feel very happy.
ch0151_00_melissa/0604_0701_04_10:
Perhaps Mismagius change their incantations
depending on who’s listening.
ch0151_00_melissa/0604_0701_05_10:
Or perhaps the effects change depending on
the person.
ch0151_00_melissa/0604_0701_06_10:
We would need Mismagius to tell us if we
wanted to know the answer, no?
ch0151_00_melissa/0604_0702_01_10:
My Mismagius can make everybody happy with
her dance. I would like to be able to do the same.
ch0151_00_melissa/0604_0702_02_10:
If I see people smiling when they watch me dance,
it makes me smile, too!
ch0151_00_melissa/0605_0701_01_10:
You have a certain...je ne sais quoi that I do not
have, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0151_00_melissa/0605_0701_02_10:
If I can discover what it is, I know I can become
stronger, too.
ch0151_00_melissa/0605_0701_03_10: So let me observe you, s’il vous plaît.
ch0151_00_melissa/0605_0701_04_10: I will become an expert on you!
ch0151_00_melissa/0605_0701_05_10:
If I can study you, I know that we will become
even better friends!
ch0151_00_melissa/0605_0702_01_10:
Wanting to know more about each other is very
common, no?
ch0151_00_melissa/0605_0702_02_10:
It is some feeling that both people and
Pokémon have!
ch0151_00_melissa/1701_0701_01_10: I have a gift for you!
ch0151_00_melissa/1701_0701_02_10: I hope you will use it on your adventures!
ch0151_00_melissa/1701_0702_01_10: If I find anything else, I will give that to you, too!
ch0151_00_melissa/1701_0702_02_10: You will use well any item I give you, yes?
ch0151_00_melissa/2501_0701_01_10:
Having your friends love what you love is such
a great feeling!
ch0151_00_melissa/2501_0701_02_10: That is why I cannot wait to see how you dance!
ch0151_00_melissa/2501_0701_03_10:
It would be so merveilleux if you learned how fun
dancing can be!
ch0151_00_melissa/2501_0702_01_10: You do not have to think hard to dance.
ch0151_00_melissa/2501_0702_02_10: Just have fun! That is the most important thing!
ch0151_00_melissa/2511_0701_01_10:
When are you having fun the most in
Pokémon battles?
ch0151_00_melissa/2511_0701_02_10:
For me, it is when I see that I have improved.
I feel the same way when I improve in
dancing, too!
ch0151_00_melissa/2511_0701_03_10:
And the more I improve, the more I love it!
So I will practice more and more!
ch0151_00_melissa/2511_0701_04_10: Is it not amazing when you can do a new skill?
ch0151_00_melissa/2511_0702_01_10: It is all right even if you fail!
ch0151_00_melissa/2511_0702_02_10: Just take your time, and work on it little by little.
ch0151_00_melissa/2511_0702_03_10:
And then, voilà! You will see that you have
gotten better!
ch0151_00_melissa/3001_0701_01_10:
Bonjour! I have so, so much énergie today!
I cannot wait to get started!
ch0151_00_melissa/3002_0701_01_10:
Whenever and wherever, danse, danse, danse!
You can, how do you say, shake off
your sleepies!
ch0151_00_melissa/3003_0701_01_10:
I wish to spend my afternoon in the sunshine!
You shall join me, yes?
ch0151_00_melissa/3004_0701_01_10:
If you want to study, it is better to start before
the sun goes down. That is what I think.
ch0151_00_melissa/3005_0701_01_10:
The path outside can be a little dark at night,
so watch where your feet are going!
ch0151_00_melissa/3006_0701_01_10:
When you danse in the moonlight, you should,
how do you say, look your step! You don’t
want to fall and trip!
